title: Rescuers find a survivor after a Siberian coal mine exploded but many are feared dead
content:
1. Rescuers find a survivor after a Siberian coal mine exploded but many are feared dead  NPR
  2. Russia mourns victims of deadly mine accident  Reuters
  3. UMW's Roberts expresses sorrow over Russian miners, outrage over safety conditions  West Virginia MetroNews
  4. Criminal Investigation Launched Into Siberian Coal Mine Explosion  NBC News
  5. A Mine Disaster in Russia Highlights Safety Shortfalls in Rush to Dig Coal  The New York Times
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News
